Tower Hamlets Local Plan 307 BIODIVERSITY AND OPEN SPACE Supporting text 18.7 This policy seeks to protect and enhance the borough’s valuable network of green and blue spaces and promote the creation of publicly accessible open spaces which are better connected and provide a wide range of opportunities for local communities and visitors in line with the Open Space Strategy, Green Grid Strategy, and other relevant strategies. It also seeks to protect and enhance the borough’s water spaces, which enhance the borough’s character, provide open space, recreation opportunities, and significant biodiversity benefits.
